rules: Rule1: Provided that the disease control team has access to the testing platform, monitoring is active for the surveillance system.
Rule2: Whenever clinical trials are completed by medical research, the drug is approved by the regulatory agency.
Rule3: Provided that the drug is approved by the regulatory agency, treatment is developed by the lab team.
Rule4: If quarantine is implemented in the natural reserve, then the outbreak is controlled at the global level.

Rule5: John Smith is a field epidemiologist implies that, if it is not the case that not implementing quarantine in the natural reserve leads to wildlife migration by infected animals, then cross-species transmission occurs for the disease.
Rule6: Either John Smith is a field epidemiologist or Jane Doe is a public health officer.

Rule7: Either an international alert is issued by the WHO or, if it is not the case that Jane Doe being a public health officer implies that not implementing quarantine in the natural reserve leads to wildlife migration by infected animals causing cross-species transmission for the disease, then a containment breach occurs in the quarantine zone.
Rule8: Under the condition that a relief package is passed by the legislature, economic stimulus is approved by parliament.
Rule9: Whenever recession is declared in the economy, market collapse occurs in the financial sector.

Rule10: David Brown is the health minister implies that, if it is not the case that calling an emergency session by congress leads to a relief package being passed by the legislature, then recession is declared in the economy.

Rule11: Provided that Maria Garcia is the crisis coordinator, if it is not the case that calling an emergency session by congress results in a relief package being passed by the legislature, then recession is declared in the economy.
Rule12: If the CDC is a government agency, then either David Brown is the health minister or Maria Garcia is the crisis coordinator.
Rule13: Under the condition that accurate information is in the released statements, public panic does not occur on social media.
Rule14: If transparent reporting is done by the health department, then accurate information is in the released statements.
Rule15: Provided that the whistleblower is protected by the legal system, censorship is not implemented on media outlets.

Rule16: Under the condition that the security council is a UN body, if there is a WHO director for the health organization, then having a UN representative for global health implies that, if it is not the case that either the border is closed by the neighboring country or quarantine is implemented in the natural reserve, then diplomatic tensions exist in international relations.
Rule17: Whenever the vaccine is distributed to medical workers, if the quarantine is lifted in the affected zone, then the outbreak is not contained at the regional hospital.
Rule18: Provided that travel is restricted in high-risk areas, if the vaccine is not distributed to medical workers, then misinformation is spread on the public forum.
Rule19: If research is funded for the outbreak study, then emergency funding is approved by the government.

Rule20: Under the condition that it is not the case that the disease control team having access to the testing platform leads to the outbreak being controlled at the global level, then the outbreak is contained at the regional hospital.
Rule21: If it is not the case that monitoring being active for the surveillance system leads to the outbreak being controlled at the global level, then public panic occurs on social media.

Rule22: Provided that it is not the case that monitoring being active for the surveillance system results in the outbreak being controlled at the global level, then a press conference is held by the official spokesperson.
Rule23: If it is not the case that holding a press conference by the official spokesperson leads to transparent reporting by the health department, then censorship is implemented on media outlets.

Rule24: Under the condition that it is not the case that either the border is closed by the neighboring country or quarantine is implemented in the natural reserve, then diplomatic tensions do not exist in international relations.

Rule25: Provided that it is not the case that not implementing quarantine in the natural reserve results in wildlife migration by infected animals, then cross-species transmission does not occur for the disease.

Rule26: Under the condition that it is not the case that the outbreak not being controlled at the global level leads to research being funded for the outbreak study, then clinical trials are completed by medical research.
Rule27: Provided that the outbreak is not controlled at the global level, then an emergency session is called by congress.
facts: Fact1: The disease control team has access to the testing platform.
Fact2: The CDC is a government agency.
Fact3: The quarantine is lifted in the affected zone.
Fact4: The whistleblower is protected by the legal system.
Fact5: There is a UN representative for global health.
Fact6: There is a WHO director for the health organization.
Fact7: The security council is a UN body.
Fact8: Travel is restricted in high-risk areas.
Fact9: Wildlife migration does not occur by infected animals.
Fact10: A containment breach does not occur in the quarantine zone.
Fact11: An international alert is not issued by the WHO.
Fact12: Economic stimulus is not approved by parliament.
Fact13: Market collapse does not occur in the financial sector.
Fact14: The border is not closed by the neighboring country.
Fact15: Misinformation is not spread on the public forum.
Fact16: Emergency funding is not approved by the government.
Fact17: Treatment is not developed by the lab team.

question: The outbreak is controlled at the global level.
